title: Chapter 1573 - The Primeval Gate
body:
Chapter 1573 - The Primeval Gate

Immediately afterward, Su Yi stood before the second stele and started pointing out the flaws of its formation.

Inwardly, he couldn’t help but recall visions of the past. Way back when, he, the Black Dragon Dao Monarch, and a group of friends feasted and clinked glasses here. It was a joyous occasion.

They’d also contemplated the source Dao Markings of the Nine Steles of the Primeval Era and argued until they were red in the face. On numerous occasions, they almost came to blows.

It was to the point that Yu Xuanji, the man they called the greatest master of talismans and formations in the Immortal Realm, cursed Wang Ye out in front of the crowd, calling him an ignoramus with no understanding of the mysteries of Dao Markings.

But in the end…

Wang Ye managed to crack the mysteries of the Nine Steles of the Primeval Era one step ahead of him.

Su Yi vividly recalled how Yu Xuanji had run his fingers through his beard as he sat there like a stone statue, his aged face alternating white, green, purple, and red. It was a truly wondrous scene.

Wang Ye burst into laughter and shouted for joy.

In truth, Wang Ye managed to discern the steles’ secrets largely thanks to Yu Xuanji’s inspiration....
